Chris:

> RFC 2616 suggests an alternative approach which is less wasteful of
> bandwidth:
> 
> Client: PUT /docs/67.3
> 
> Server: 201 Created HTTP/1.1
>         Location: /docs/67.4

I like it!  Clean, simple and only one HTTP round trip required.


Andrzej Jan Taramina
